document.body:
A Beyond.com Career Community Employers: Home
Home Job Seeker Login Post Resume Search Jobs Career Resources
Jobs in Travel / Hospitality / Restaurant
If you are looking for some information about a specific type of job or are just curious about other career paths, review the following positions to help choose the right one for you.
Baggage Porters and Bellhops Handle baggage for travelers at transportation terminals or for guests at hotels or similar establishments. Bakers Mix and bake ingredients according to recipes to produce breads, rolls, cookies, cakes, pies, pastries, or other baked goods. Bartenders Mix and serve drinks to patrons, directly or through waitstaff.
